text:
HubDB API orderBy GEO Distance is working properly
`<https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/450117/rows?portalId=468777&orderBy=geo_distance(lat_long,21.2272242,72.8882792)>`

but when i try to filter it out by less than 5 km then it’s not working….(I know below URL is not a valid URL, but just to give a idea)
`<https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/table_id/rows?portalId=portal_id&orderBy=geo_distance(lat_long,21.2272242,72.8882792,km)__lt=5>`

Any idea how to achieve this using hubDB API or does this before ??
